  "        cy:command (K): clock
        cy:command (K): visit	https://example.cypress.io/commands/spies-stubs-clocks
        cy:command (K): get	#tick-div
        cy:command (K): click
        cy:command (K): assert	expected **<div#tick-div>** to have text **'1489449600'**
                        Actual: 	"1489449600"
                        Expected: 	"1489449600"
        cy:command (K): tick	10000ms
        cy:command (K): get	#tick-div
        cy:command (K): click
        cy:command (K): assert	expected **<div#tick-div>** to have text **'1489449610'**
                        Actual: 	"1489449610"
                        Expected: 	"1489449610"
"
]

tests.title: cy.stub() matches depending on arguments
tests.fullTitle: Spies, Stubs, and Clock cy.stub() matches depending on arguments
tests.context:
[
  {
    "title": "cypress-mochawesome-reporter-screenshots",
    "value": [
      []
    ]
  },
  "        cy:command (K): stub-1	greet("World")
        cy:command (K): assert	expected **Hi** to equal **Hi**
                        Actual: 	"Hi"
                        Expected: 	"Hi"
        cy:command (K): assert	expected **[Function]** to be a function
        cy:command (K): stub-1	greet(42)
        cy:command (K): assert	expected **[Function]** to throw an error
        cy:command (K): assert	expected greet to have been called exactly twice
        cy:command (K): stub-1	greet()
        cy:command (K): assert	expected **Hello, undefined!** to equal **Hello, undefined!**
                        Actual: 	"Hello, undefined!"
                        Expected: 	"Hello, undefined!"
"
]
